field.name: TemplateStyle
field.label: Default Template Style
field.description: Select your default template style that you would like to use for your website.

field.name: styleswitcher
field.label: Display Style Switcher?
field.description: Would you like to display the Style Switcher on the right of your website so that your members can change the template style above?

field.name: responsive_template
field.label: Enabled Responsive?
field.description: If you Enable this parameter you will have a Responsive template , which will fit in every screen resolution. Such as smartphone and tablets. (Yes is recommended)

field.name: logo
field.label: Site Logo
field.description: Select your website logo image from your computer and chose it as the default logo.

field.name: homepage_content
field.label: Hide Frontpage content?
field.description: Would you like to hide the content (Joomla content) on the frontpage? Enable this feature only if you plan to use only modules on the frontpage

field.name: equal_column
field.label: Enable Equal Columns?
field.description: Would you like to enable the Equal height columns to have the same height for all the columns?

field.name: icelogo
field.label: IceTheme Logo
field.description: Choose whether you want to keep the IceTheme logo or not. (Not obligatory)

field.name: go2top
field.label: Go To Top Link
field.description: Would you like to enable a scrolling image on the bottom right of your website so that you members can scroll to top easily?

field.name: social_icon_fb
field.label: Show Facebook Icon?
field.description: Wwheter to show or not the Facebok icon (on the footer)

field.name: social_fb_user
field.label: Facebook Fan Page Username
field.description: Enter here your Facebook Fan Page Username

field.name: social_icon_tw
field.label: Show Twitter Icon?
field.description: Whether to show or not the Facebook icon (on the footer)

field.name: social_icon_yt
field.label: Show Youtube Icon?
field.description: Whether to show or not the YouTube icon (on the footer)

field.name: Add Custom CSS
field.description: You may enter here your Custom CSS code to overwrite the default CSS that we have added on the template. Also you may paste here CSS codes that our support team may have given to you.

field.name: google_analytics
field.label: Track with Google Analytics?
field.description: Would you like to measure your website with Google Analytics? You should have an Google Analytics account to enable this feature. For more information please go to google.com/analytics

field.name: analytics_code
field.label: Google Analytics ID
field.description: Enter here your Google Analytics unique id e.g: UA-31764391-1
